summary: Makes Ysolda an Over Powered follower.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim: No DLC
Makes Ysolda a Level 250 Nightblade Follower. She automatically has spouse dialogue, so you can marry another NPC.
Gives Ysolda Daedric Armour and weapons, along with various spells, a few shouts, and items as well.
Shouts:
Unrelenting Force
Frost Breath
Fire Breath
Become Ethereal

Spells:
Chain Lightning
Blizzard
Frost Cloak
Healing
Invisibility
Ebonyflesh
Conjure Storm Atronach
Thunderbolt
(Modified) Vampiric Drain

Items:
Daedric Cuirass, Boots, Gauntlets, 2x Daedric Sword of the Vampire, Daedric Bow of Immobilizing
10x Human Heart
10x Human Flesh

DLC's:
I have to get the DLC's working with creation kit. Some error shows up and the program spontaneously combusts. Might get around to fixing it some time...
author: Chinkaninka

files.name: Ysolda the Ripper Update
files.changelogHtml:
Removed Buggy Spells/Shouts
Modified Vampiric Drain~ Absorbs 15 Health Over 10 Seconds, Costs 58 Magicka, Area of Effect, Concentration Spell
